Welcome to Group-Project-Sport-Analysis’s documentation!¶

Analysis¶

This is the module which contains class which returns analysis based on team you have selected.

class analysis.Analysis(team_id)¶

Analysing class.

analyze_team_ball_possesion()¶

This method returns ball possesion of the team.

analyze_team_fouls()¶

This method returns team fouls.

analyze_team_schemas()¶

This method returns schemas which team uses.

analyze_team_shots()¶

This method returns team shots.

choose_team()¶

This method allows to choose team.

get_info(criterion)¶

This method returns information which you choose.

API_requests¶

This module contains requests from API-s.

class API_requests.Requests¶

This is requests class.

static get_available_leagues()¶

This method returns list of available leagues.

static get_events_by_team_id(team_id)¶

This method returns events connected with team using team ID number.

static get_teams_by_league_id(league_id)¶

This method returns team by its ID number.

App¶

Main file to run the server

app.analyze()¶

Get information .

app.get_all_teams()¶

Get all teams in available legues.

app.get_available_leagues()¶

Get all available leagues.

app.get_teams_by_league_id()¶

Get all teams in league by its id.

Arrays¶

File: arrays.py An Array is a restricted list whose clients can use only [], len, iter, and str. To instantiate, use <variable> = array(<capacity>, <optional fill value>) The fill value is None by default.

class arrays.Array(capacity, fillValue=None)¶

Represents an array.

class arrays.ArrayExpanded(capacity, fillValue=None)¶

Represents an array.

grow()¶

Increases the physical size of the array if necessary.

insert(index, newItem)¶

Inserts item at index in the array.

pop(index)¶

Removes and returns item at index in the array. Precondition: 0 <= index < size()

shrink()¶

Decreases the physical size of the array if necessary.

size()¶

-> The number of items in the array.

Cache data¶

This module caches data taken from the API.

cache_data.get_all_teams()¶

This fucntion returns all available teams.

cache_data.read_all_teams(file_path)¶

This function reades and returns all the teams from file.

cache_data.write_to_file(file_path, data)¶

This function writes all teams from def get_all_teams().

Event¶

This module contains class Event which will be used in Team ADT.

class event.Event(event_info: object)¶

Event class. Class atribute is json file from API.

get_ball_possesion(team_id: str)¶

This method returns ball possesion of the team.

get_fouls(team_id: str)¶

This method returns team fouls.

get_result(team_id: str)¶

This method returns results of the mathch.

get_scheme(team_id: str)¶

This method returns scheme which team uses.

get_shots(team_id: str)¶

This method returns team shots.

process_event_info(event_info: object)¶

This method creates self atributes for json file.

Team¶

This module contains ADT -> Team.

class team.Team(team_id: str)¶

Team ADT The atribute of this class is team ID.

analyze_schemas()¶

This method returns analysis of the schemas displayed in graphic.

get_ball_possesion_info()¶

This method returns teams ball possesion.

get_fouls_info()¶

This method returns information about fouls in a game.

get_last_events()¶

This method return all last eventes.

get_results_of_events()¶

This method returns result of the chosen event.

get_schemas_info()¶

This method returns information about schemas which team uses.

get_shots_info()¶

This method retruns information about shots in the game.
